name: @nartallax/picgen_webgui
description: A web GUI to wrap arbitrary picture generating program with.
author: Nartallax

scripts.release: npm run typecheck && npm run release:prepare && npm run release:client && npm run release:server && npm run release:supplementals && npm run release:packagejson && npm run release:package
scripts.release:client: npm run icons:generate && ./node_modules/.bin/parcel build --target client_release --no-cache && mv dist/client_release target/static
scripts.release:packagejson: cp package.json target && cp package-lock.json target
scripts.release:supplementals: mkdir target/supplemental && cp picture_generator_example.js target/supplemental && cp -r config target/supplemental/config && cp README.md target/supplemental
scripts.release:package: cd target && zip -r `date +"picgen_webgui.%Y_%m_%d_%H_%M_%S.zip"` ./* && echo "Done; result is" `ls *.zip` && cd ..
scripts.dev: npm run typecheck && npm run icons:generate && npm run dev:client & npm run dev:server & wait
scripts.dev:server: npm run dev:server:build && ((./node_modules/.bin/wait-file-change ./dist/server_dev/server_main.js -t 3 && npm run dev:server:run) & npm run dev:server:watch & wait)
scripts.icons:generate: ./node_modules/.bin/icon-font-tool --svg-dir src/client/icons --font-path src/client/generated/icons --font-normalize --font-descent 150 --css-path src/client/generated/icons.css --ts-path src/client/generated/icons.ts --ts-css-import-style star --ts-name Icon
